channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: TMC - Defects - Road Markings problem, 15th April
item.description:
PLEASE REPAINT WHITE LINES 15 X DOUBLE DOTS 15 X SINGLE DOTS 3 X CENTER LINES 1 X TRIANGLE 4 WAY TRAFFIC LIGHTS (Faded Road Markings)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Footways Slabs problem, 15th April
item.description:
28 day with give an take plus temporary footway closure needed please replace x1 broken rocking 900x600x20mm slab with tarmac due to tree roots damage number 1 (FW Broken Slabs)
Report on FixMyStreet
